Author: tigerchik
Text: It's likely hormone-related - your body is now getting enough energy that it turned the hormone factory back on.

Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: Not a doctor but I wonder if your body is burning more calories as you consume more calories than you would have been while (I assume) restricting, and burning calories produces heat, so I would imagine you're running hotter than normal and therefore sweating??  I could be completely wrong but that's my logic giving it all I've got!!
